    • Class view.subviews.CustomPanel extends javax.swing.JPanel implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • controller

          java.lang.Object controller
          Just another normal controller (MVC pattern). Receive the actions from the user, check them, then transmit them to the model.

        • isHorizontalMode

          java.util.function.BooleanSupplier isHorizontalMode
          A short function used to know the largest side of the frame.

        • contentSection

          Section<ControllerT> contentSection
          This section is horizontally centered in the CustomPanel and is always displayed (in horizontalMode and verticalMode).

        • leftSection

          Section<ControllerT> leftSection
          The LeftSection of the CustomPanel, more information in the javadoc of the class.

        • rightSection

          Section<ControllerT> rightSection
          The RightSection of the CustomPanel, more information in the javadoc of the class.
